website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line sizzling fajita pan set with a wooden base and removable handle.
pros: With a larger cooking and serving surface than most of its competitors, this pan set wins points for being able to hold larger portions
The removable handle is also appreciated for reducing the risk of burns when using to keep food hot on the dinner table
cons: It's expensive and some find the removable handle to be a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Listed as same part #
customer_reviews.text: This was the same part # previous bought but was 2 inch smaller. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: arlina

customer_reviews.title: Like a good steak platter....only smaller
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this sizzlin platter except for it’s size. Well made. Keeps food hot until you finish your meal. Easy to clean. The problem is the child-portion size. Thought I’d be getting a platter like I’ve seen in the better steak houses. It’s impossible to get a normal sized steak to fit this one without flopping over the edges and getting juices everywhere. And forget about adding a side dish unless you’re talking a hockey puck size petit filet and a few stalks of asparagus. I already used these and threw away the packaging, so no returns possible. My mistake. I’ll be buying a larger version for dining, maybe use these as side dish warmers or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kensberg

customer_reviews.title: Super Hot Plates
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates for meat dishes I need hot plates for. Good, heavy cast iron plates. I ordered two more later and for some reason the bases were changed to a much lighter wood and the plates don't fit quite as well. Still really like them and use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Frey

customer_reviews.title: Totally enjoy this simple product, used frequently
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little plate. I use almost exclusively for steaks, or fish without skin. Not recommended for chicken, as it’s designed for searing. Also works really nicely for vegetables like Asparagus or GreenBeans(stuff that’s pretty solid and retains it’s shape). I keep mine on the grill, and just deglaze it once it heats up, prior to applying the food.
customer_reviews.author: Myke

customer_reviews.title: wood base bubbled
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy having these plates, however as others have stated they can only hold a steak and nothing else. The other issue I had is the wooden base can't handle the hot plates too well as the wood bubbled up from the heat of the plate. It is on the bottom where the plate sits so you can't see it but this still should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Mommalyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Steak Plate
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I cooked some Wagyu on this and it kept it from burning and cooked it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizzizling Steaks
customer_reviews.text: Plate does just fine. It was of good quality and cleans easily. It would be nice if it was a little bigger. A 1 lb. T bone fills it up and even hangs over the side and leaves no room for a potato. For smaller portions it's fine. .
customer_reviews.author: Old- Salt

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great presentation when you bring a steak to the table.
customer_reviews.text: Both the pan and wood platter are good looking and nice quality. Your friends and family will be impressed when you serve them steaks on the pan and platter.
customer_reviews.author: badge2283

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: Definitely as heavy as I was hoping for! Detachable handle and wooden support board are great extras. Have heated these on the bbq to present sizzling steaks to the table, and melted cheese onto them. They are sturdy and dependable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: It came as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The plate came with a separate handle and a wooden holder as described. I bought a cast iron plate from another company and it pictured a wooden holder also, but I discovered that after purchasing it wasn't included. These people are OK and I'm pleased with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, but too small. I have looked for bigger ones like this, with the wood base and the detachable handle, but no luck. I like to cook big cuts of meat and these will not hold a big porterhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Season and nothing sticks
customer_reviews.text: Season this and nothing will stick. This is the best size to fit into our pizza oven.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Size and Keeps food HOT !
customer_reviews.text: Use them all the time ... Just the right size for a single serve meal. Keeps food hot for quite a long time. I would give 5 stars, but one of the wooden pieces has split apart (about 1.5 inches) at a seam. No big deal, but not perfect
customer_reviews.author: DL2302

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these are not true cast iron...they are coated. I wish that I realized before I couldn't return!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cascardo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful on day one
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful on day one, but the wood cracked after less than a month, and the pans started peeling their coating and had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: I don't cook on them. I heat them up and serve food on them. (My husband was always complaining that his med-rare steaks were never warm enough even though they went from stove to plate to table in less than a minute. Now the steaks have a little time to rest - which improves flavor & his complaints have ended)
customer_reviews.author: G. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron is the best cookware when it comes to flavor and even temperate cooking. I love being able to go from the oven to the table using the wood serving trays. I use them for fish, chicken, steak. Perfect size for 1 serving, especially if you are trying to watch serving size.
customer_reviews.author: BJI

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but wood plate damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron is fine. The removable handle is heavy (in a good way) and of good quality. I like the size of the cast iron plates. I was worried about size since many reviews of other cast iron plates complained about the size being too small to fit anything beyond a medium size steak. I ordered two of these plates, but one of the wood plates were chipped and scratched. I was entertaining that night, so I tried to sand and stain the wood. Still doesn't look great but probably too late to return the item. Cast iron = 5 stars Wood plate = 1 star
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a single setting
customer_reviews.text: Is a little smaller than what I expected. Works great as a single setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple of times and we have noticed that the finish is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron not as thick as I expected. Leading ...
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron not as thick as I expected. Leading to loss of heat faster. The wooden base keeps the temperature going longer.
customer_reviews.author: Veinlancer

customer_reviews.title: Size not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the size of this plate. It will hold one chicken breast or one steak. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, a bit smaller than I had hoped for and a bit on the expensive side, but still happy with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like them. Small, but perfect size for the amounts we eat.
customer_reviews.author: L Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very good, just a little small
customer_reviews.text: these are just what I was looking for. I heated them at 450 in the oven and when the steaks came off the grill and onto the plates, they sizzled and stayed hot the entire meal. They're just a tad small but, since I prefer ribeye steaks, they're just right!!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizzling cast iron steaks just like at the restaurant
customer_reviews.text: Nice sizzling cast iron steaks just like at the restaurant. Steak takes up the whole plate, so still have to use plates for side items as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: so haot so fine
customer_reviews.text: these are great, keeps the food hot thru dinner even when you eat slow like me. be sure and prepare the plate before using it, so the food wont stick
customer_reviews.author: D. madden

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed in this product. Also there was no utensil added for moving the hot platters. I purchased two sets of these. Neither of them had the handle included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, nice and heavy. 1 handle needed a little file to fit but was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Can't even fit an 8 oz steak.
customer_reviews.author: DutchSamoan

customer_reviews.title: Very very small
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless! The plate won’t hold a kids cheeseburger and fries!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Pans are nice but both handles arrived broken how can I get new handles?
customer_reviews.author: Suellen

customer_reviews.title: We love these sizzling steak plates
customer_reviews.text: We love these sizzling steak plates, I thought they would be to small, but my husband said to order them, they were a little bit bigger than I had anticipated. The wood is also better than we anticipated. I love shopping amazon, free shipping on $35.00 and over. It seems like we are always surprised have fast our order arrives. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sara R. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Jack Spratt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent when you heat in a 400 degree oven keeps food warm for the meal and I am a slow eater.
customer_reviews.author: jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but a little small
customer_reviews.text: The plates work fine. My only beef if their size. If you grill up a 12 oz steak, that is the only thing that will fit on the plate. If I could do it over again, I would have bought bigger ones. Oh well. The wooden base works well with the plate. One other thing, and it is probably obvious. If you eat your steak from this plate, the knife will scratch the black off the plate fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Oil Can

customer_reviews.title: The Best Way to Serve Sizzling Steaks
customer_reviews.text: We love these cast iron plates. The best way to keep your steaks sizzling for your first bite. Durable and easy to clean. Best grilling accessory we’ve added to our arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: rejina christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grill
customer_reviews.text: Although small, this pan works great for grilling veggies for two people. The removable handle is good feature that works well.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This product was far better than expected. I gave these to a couple with a new outdoor kitchen and grill and they love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Namco

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Sizzling Plate Medium #tbsp2
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sizzling steak plate was great but I thought the trivet that held the plate was of poor quality. In fact, one of the trivets was split down the middle on receipt. Had no problem receiving a replacement. I just didn't like the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Joan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the mini Big Green Egg!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small cast iron dish with removable handle to cook fish in the Mini Big Green Egg. Fits perfect and does the job. Great for scallops, shrimp and a large single serving of fish!
customer_reviews.author: S Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not great but good
customer_reviews.text: A bit small but its for small meats. It also looses the coating inside the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Jaraique

customer_reviews.title: Larger Size Plates Would Help
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Plates were smaller than I expected for a larger sreak. I wanted plates more like the ones used at Ruth's Chris.
customer_reviews.author: L. Don Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these items for a friend and he has enjoyed using them over and over. Thanks - thinking of purchasing some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley H. Zandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: IThis product is great, I just hope the price would be a little bit lower. This will be better if at that price, 2 pieces per pack.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Product great  -- Shipping cost not so great
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. The plates could be large but they do a great job. The shipping cost for expediting is unreal $30.00 for a 2-3 days delivery and it took 7. I think that was crazy but I really wanted these plates to suprise my husband. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Sizzler
customer_reviews.text: I was exceptionally please with the sizzler. Just what I wanted. The steaks come out sizzling in the plate. The only problem is that the wooden holder is made of pine, don't like the smell of burnt pine.
customer_reviews.author: Chester W. Mocheski

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay
customer_reviews.text: Got the item on time in replace to the other cast iron plate i just ordered 2 days before i order this. The 1st one that I order was CHEAPLY MADE cause the wooden base that hold the plate has a huge crack in it. And now for this one when i received it, the metal fork holder for the cast iron plate is broken in two 2 pieces. If only they packed it securely i think it wont be broken but it was only wrapped by some piece of papers instead of some bubble wraps to protect the item for breaking. This issue is always on the review! when will they learn to properly wrapped an item????!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL!!
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO SMALL!! The picture shows a steak and veggies on the plate. The plates won't hold a normal sized steak all by itself. The wood base is of poor quality. Packaged with a bunch of tiny plastic beads that fall out of the box upon opening. Box and instructions are not written in English. Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Wood board was split in two on arrival. Delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: Wood board was split in two on arrival. Delivery was slow. Plate was advertised as "larger' but it was much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron a pleasure. Wood, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Our order was promptly recieved. The cast iron is well done and thus far is standing up to regular wear. The wooden platforms are useful but not of the higher standard we were expecting. There is no finish on them to protect them from damage from hot cast iron. The handles are terrific. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The sizzling steak plates are prefect. Grill your food and heat up the plates on the grill. When ready, place the food on the plates and serve.
customer_reviews.author: ParNomad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my parents. They were so excited when they received them and they called me after the first time they used them and thanked me again for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. The wood colors are different from the image and from each other. One is even scratched in its wooden part. I do not recommend this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. chef

customer_reviews.title: Keeps other foods warm that accompanies the steaks
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I wanted and they work just fine. They are very easy to clean--The steaks sizzle good after serving.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, but smaller than we thought. Should have read more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the generous lip on the plates. They help keep juices with the meat. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carlson

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: The plate was great! It's just to small for steak. So you wind up having two diffrent plates in front of you
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Spae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 'Hot Plate Tofu'
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for some way to replicate the hot plate tofu dish here in US and this works perfectly. Deep fry cubes of firm tofu. Make lobster sauce consisting of mixed frozen vegetables, garlic, sugar, chicken flavoring, sesame oil, pepper and egg drizzle. Crack a beaten egg onto the hot plate, spread the tofu evenly and top with lobster sauce. Serve hot.
customer_reviews.author: reamethable

customer_reviews.title: The plate is much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this plate and another from Cuisnart for Xmas gifts for my parents. The Cuisnart hot plate dwarfs this one in size and quality for only $6.00 more in price. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Purchase these as a gift for my dad. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these as a gift for my dad. He uses them all of the time for delicious fajitas and steak dinners....yum!
customer_reviews.author: ranee folk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only problem is that I thought they would have been alittle bigger, to hold morel than one item
customer_reviews.author: sandra morel

customer_reviews.title: My purchase of hot plates
customer_reviews.text: Excellant!!!! I would certainly purchase them again if Ineeded any more. Thank you! Dan Stern ( This was my first purchase,)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stern

customer_reviews.title: ... little smaller than I thought but they will be perfect for small steaks
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought but they will be perfect for small steaks .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mizell

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We use them at least once a week. I preheat them in the oven while food is grilling/cooking and food (even veggies) stay hot through out the meal. Just a note to others.....food continues to cook a little after putting on the pan so undercook your meat a little if you prefer med/rare steak Would buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hubiak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are great they are the right size for us
customer_reviews.author: janice hall

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time, but the wooden base for the plate is broken and has a huge crack. I red several reviews about this issue but i think until now they haven't improved yet in packing the item to protect it from damages. Again CHEAPLY MADE!!! and will not recommend it to all of you buyers...
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: save your mony
customer_reviews.text: we returned these they are way too small for a normal steak maybe ok for a breakfast steak but not any other
customer_reviews.author: Earl J. Byard

customer_reviews.title: Great for bbq
customer_reviews.text: I love these! We have a grill and use it often! They really keep the meat warm while preparing for different cooked temps.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: For midgets!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cast iron plates, but they are much too small to hold more than a small snack They should be large enough to serve a substantial meal such as steak and potato,rack of ribs or ham and eggs, etc. Thats why we opted to return them and order the Nordic ware 365 plates which are adequately sized, but do not hold heat very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sizzle platters
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a while to find the right "sizzzle plates". Always wanted to have our steaks served on hot plates just like the restaurants do. Now we got 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Wopper

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like cast for hot food!
customer_reviews.text: Food sizzles on these preheated plates and they hold the heat for the entire meal. Handles make transport from the oven to table. The wooden chargers are cheaply made pine and the heat has heated the glue used, but we know how to re-glue when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one serving of fajitias
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than advertisied. Only good for one serving of fajitias. The iron plate is only 4x7 the ad said 17x10 which would have been only the board not the plate. I wanted something for a 4-6 person serving of fajitas. I wish I could return but I did not keep box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: must have in coolerado
customer_reviews.text: If you grill year round like I do (some months are cool here) and "the lady" doesn't like her food cold, same here! These are a must-have! if you have shopped around you know how expensive they can be, don't be afraid to get them good and hot. The out of the box seasoned plate so far has done well easy to clean Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Plates are Ribbed
customer_reviews.text: I carefully ordered plates which had a smooth cutting surface. I received 4 plates from 2 separate source companies, all of which have a ribbed surface which makes it tough cutting steaks. I have returned them all, requesting they ship smooth surfaced items as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: sdwelle

customer_reviews.title: missing
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron works well, but it was missing the handle that was shown in the picture. I hope next time it will come with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: prescot

customer_reviews.title: basically just good space to hold 4-6 oz of steak
customer_reviews.text: basically just good space to hold 4-6 oz of steak. we cook a minimum of 10 oz steaks. forgot to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because the plates are very small. A medium size Ribeye or T-bone steak will hang over the sides and certainly no room left for a baked potato.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P. Blaxton

customer_reviews.title: Very Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is disappointing! The Cast Iron and the wood is cheap. I would NOT recommend this product buy the Lodge Cast Iron Fajita Skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: cast iron sizzling plates
customer_reviews.text: Small and cheap looking. A steak and vegetables won't even fit on one of the plates. Immediately returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Need English instructions
customer_reviews.text: All directions and writing are Chinese,have idea on how to use but prefer having English instructions!
customer_reviews.author: john m chachere

customer_reviews.title: The steak plate holder split into two pieces after falling on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in 2015. I never had a problem before. But a few days ago, I accidentally dropped the plate holder on the floor in the kitchen, and it SPLIT INTO TWO PIECES!!! It is not a glass to crack like that. I think this is a matter of personal safety of all customers, that's why I have decided to publish this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Alimanov

customer_reviews.title: Just right for homemade fajitas for two.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sizzle plates! I pop them in the oven at 400 degrees. Then add fajita meat. It sizzles, keeps your fajitas piping hot and the wooden plate keeps surfaces from getting scorched. I bought four and have already used them several times. They are small. So if you like a lot of food, this is not the plate for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kirwan O' Reilly

customer_reviews.title: It is slightly smaller than I expected. However it works perfectly for a two person portion
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just let the iron on the grill to heat while cooking. The handle and wood are set aside and ready to handle after food is put on the iron. It sits right on the table being protected by the wood base. Meat stays hot a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beidel

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron sizzling stead plate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a steak plate that would hold the heat and keep my steak warm as I ate it and these do that. Some people complained about the size, but the size is stated in the description. Since I cook mostly New York strip steaks this plate is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal  Good product.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, these are just too cool! Works great in oven or on the grill. I prepared restaurant quality steaks! My guests were surprised. Versatile, easy to maintain, and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those cooking items that work so well you end up buying one for everyone you know. It's great for holding anything coming off the grill and keeping it hot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep your fajita meat hot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cast iron plate, but is very small. I will warm this up and us it as a warming plate for my fajita meat or peppers & onions, but it is not large enough to cook on for two people. Wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not such a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: The 'black' has started coming off after only a few uses. The board is poorly made and flimsy. Avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: RWT

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought two One of the wood trivets came with a large crack The other was chipped I have yet to hear back from the seller
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: These plates are really nice except for the wood plate holder
customer_reviews.text: These plates are really nice except for the wood plate holder, ours split in three places after using it a few times. They are a good size for single serving portions.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P

customer_reviews.title: Filet Mignon & Baked Potato!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a normal sized steak plate that would fit a small steak & baked potato & this is perfect! We weren't looking for a HUGE plate so if that's what you want don't consider this plate.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Steak Plate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter and her husband and they are pleased with it. They say the product is a high quality and meets their requirements for a sturdy plate to keep the steaks sizzling. I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: they sizzle
customer_reviews.text: helps us maintain our weight, keeps the food nice and hot and our portions small
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Great product and my guests love seeing my food sizzle ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my guests love seeing my food sizzle right in front of them. Most important is not bulky or heavy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: danh kom

customer_reviews.title: I use these all the time. They have held ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. They have held up my extensive use, although I feel they don't hold heat as long as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Err

customer_reviews.title: If you don't own these you should😊
customer_reviews.text: Work beautifully! Clean up easily and easy to store. I don't know how we ever enjoyed steaks without them!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Quigley-Larke

customer_reviews.title: sizzling plates do great stakes
customer_reviews.text: these plates cook a great steak and clean up great after the meal. love the wooden holders and every thing about the product, more than I expected for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Cast parts okay, wood is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my dad for father's day. The cast iron parts were fine, but the wood plates arrived banged up from the cast handle. The stain color of the wood was different colors between the two. I ended up sanding them down to the bare wood, refinishing them and clear coating them. After putting my time into fixing them they are okay now. Worked nicely for our father's day grill out. But be warned, it is a cheap product that will likely show up in fair to poor condition.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron plate with wooden holder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price paid. Both work great together. After getting it prepped, heated and then using it, I'm recommending it to my grilling friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chilliwack Buck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just bought our second set. They keep food hot during the complete meal.
